appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write migration data via the SharePoint admin site without a signed-in user.
appRoles.displayName: Read and write access to migration data on the SharePoint admin site

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read migration data via the SharePoint admin site without a signed-in user.
appRoles.displayName: Read access to migration data on the SharePoint admin site

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write site collection metadata without a signed-in user.

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read site collection metadata without a signed-in user.

appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.
appRoles.displayName: Read and write items in all site collections

appRoles.description: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections without a signed in user.
appRoles.displayName: Have full control of all site collections

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete document libraries and lists in all site collections without a signed in user.
appRoles.displayName: Read and write items and lists in all site collections

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read enterprise managed metadata and to read basic site info without a signed in user.
Allows the app to write enterprise managed metadata and to read basic site info without a signed in user.
Allows the app to read and update user profiles and to read basic site info without a signed in user.
Allows the app to read user profiles without a signed in user.
Allow the application to access a subset of site collections without a signed in user. The specific site collections and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to access a subset of site collections with a signed-in user. The specific site collections and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to access a subset of site collections on your behalf. The specific site collections and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all OData reporting data from all ProjectWebApp site collections for the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all OData reporting data from all ProjectWebApp site collections for the signed-in user.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to submit project task status updates the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to submit project task status updates the signed-in user.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete the current user’s enterprise resources.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read managed metadata and to read basic site info on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read managed metadata and to read basic site info on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete managed metadata and to read basic site info on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete managed metadata and to read basic site info on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to run search queries and to read basic site info on behalf of the current signed-in user. Search results are based on the user's permissions instead of the app's permissions.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Run search queries as a user
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to run search queries and to read basic site info on your behalf. Search results are based on your permissions.

publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections on your behalf.
